sneckomod:GildedShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL sneckomod:Muddle this, then return it to your hand.

sneckomod:Mesmerize.NAME: Mesmerize
sneckomod:Mesmerize.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. NL sneckomod:Muddle a card. NL Exhaust.

sneckomod:Serpentscale.NAME: Serpentscale
sneckomod:Serpentscale.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 expansioncontent:Plated *Armor. NL sneckomod:Overflow: Gain !M! *Plated *Armor instead.

sneckomod:OtherworldlySlash.NAME: Otherworldly Slash
sneckomod:OtherworldlySlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you played an sneckomod:Offclass card this turn, deal !D! damage again. NL sneckomod:Gift: Common.
sneckomod:OtherworldlySlash.DESCRIPTION_BATTLE: Deal !D! damage. NL If you played an sneckomod:Offclass card this turn, deal !D! damage again..

sneckomod:BeyondArmor.NAME: Beyond Armor
sneckomod:BeyondArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put !M! random sneckomod:Offclass cards from your draw pile into your hand. NL sneckomod:Gift: Common.
sneckomod:BeyondArmor.DESCRIPTION_BATTLE: Gain !B! Block. NL Put !M! random sneckomod:Offclass cards from your draw pile into your hand.

sneckomod:BlunderGuard.NAME: Blunder Guard
sneckomod:BlunderGuard.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card that costs 3+, gain !qqq! Block and !M! Strength.
sneckomod:BlunderGuard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card that costs 3+, gain !qqq! Block and !M! Strength.

sneckomod:WideAngle.NAME: Wide Angle
sneckomod:WideAngle.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

sneckomod:SerpentsNest.NAME: Serpent's Nest
sneckomod:SerpentsNest.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Power, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies. NL sneckomod:Gift: Uncommon Power.
sneckomod:SerpentsNest.DESCRIPTION_BATTLE: Whenever you play a Power, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

sneckomod:Whack.NAME: Whack!
sneckomod:Whack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Wallop to your hand. NL Exhaust.
sneckomod:Whack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Wallop+ to your hand. NL Exhaust.

sneckomod:CobraCoil.NAME: Cobra Coil
sneckomod:CobraCoil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! *Constricted. NL sneckomod:Gift: Rare Attack.

sneckomod:Belittle.NAME: Belittle
sneckomod:Belittle.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! HP for each unique debuff they have. NL sneckomod:Gift: Uncommon Debuff.
sneckomod:Belittle.DESCRIPTION_BATTLE: Enemy loses !M! HP for each unique debuff they have.

sneckomod:MakeshiftBlade.NAME: Makeshift Blade
sneckomod:MakeshiftBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the target has at least !M! debuffs, draw !qqq! cards. NL sneckomod:Gift: Debuff.
sneckomod:MakeshiftBlade.DESCRIPTION_BATTLE: Deal !D! damage. If the target has at least !M! debuffs, draw !qqq! cards.

sneckomod:LatchOn.NAME: Latch On
sneckomod:LatchOn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Add a *Viper *Essence to your hand.

sneckomod:ComboString.NAME: Combo String
sneckomod:ComboString.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each sneckomod:Offclass card played this turn. NL sneckomod:Gift: Uncommon.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL (hits
x times.)
sneckomod:ComboString.DESCRIPTION_BATTLE: Deal !D! damage for each sneckomod:Offclass card played this turn.

sneckomod:ThrowingCards.NAME: Throwing Cards
sneckomod:ThrowingCards.DESCRIPTION: Add X copies of *FTL to your hand. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.
sneckomod:ThrowingCards.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add X copies of *FTL+ to your hand. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.

sneckomod:RoundaboutSwing.NAME: Roundabout Swing
sneckomod:RoundaboutSwing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a card in hand on top of your draw pile. NL Draw !M! additional cards next turn.

sneckomod:MarkedCard.NAME: Marked Card
sneckomod:MarkedCard.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL sneckomod:Muddle a card. NL It will always be cheaper. NL Exhaust.
sneckomod:MarkedCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL sneckomod:Muddle !M! cards. NL They will always be cheaper. NL Exhaust.

sneckomod:InertBlade.NAME: Inert Blade
sneckomod:InertBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this costs... NL 1+: Draw !M! cards. NL 2+: Gain !M! Strength. NL 3+: Gain [E].
sneckomod:InertBlade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this costs... NL 1+: Draw !M! cards. NL 2+: Gain !M! Strength. NL 3+: Gain [E] [E].

sneckomod:LastStrike.NAME: Final Strike
sneckomod:LastStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat for each unique Strike played this combat. NL sneckomod:Gift: Strike.
sneckomod:LastStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat for each unique Strike played this combat. NL sneckomod:Gift: Strike.
sneckomod:LastStrike.DESCRIPTION_BATTLE: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat for each unique Strike played this combat.
sneckomod:LastStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION_BATTLE: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat for each unique Strike played this combat.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL (hits
x extra times.)

sneckomod:AceOfWands.NAME: Queen of Pentacles
sneckomod:AceOfWands.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, gain !M! Block. NL sneckomod:Gift: Debuff.
sneckomod:AceOfWands.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, gain !M! Block. NL sneckomod:Gift: Debuff.

sneckomod:FlashInThePan.NAME: Flash in the Pan
sneckomod:FlashInThePan.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Discard your hand. NL Draw that many cards next turn.

sneckomod:TrashCan.NAME: Trash Can
sneckomod:TrashCan.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, you may Exhaust a card.
sneckomod:TrashCan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, you may Exhaust a card.

sneckomod:Lacerate.NAME: Lacerate
sneckomod:Lacerate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Whenever this enemy is debuffed this turn they gain !M! sneckomod:Venom. sneckomod:Gift: *Crippling *Cloud.
sneckomod:Lacerate.DESCRIPTION_BATTLE: Deal !D! damage. Whenever this enemy is debuffed this turn they gain !M! sneckomod:Venom.

sneckomod:SerpentineSleuth.NAME: Serpentine Sleuth
sneckomod:SerpentineSleuth.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever you play a Power, gain [E]. NL sneckomod:Gift: Rare Power.
sneckomod:SerpentineSleuth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever you play a Power, gain [E] [E]. NL sneckomod:Gift: Rare Power.
sneckomod:SerpentineSleuth.DESCRIPTION_BATTLE: Ethereal. NL Whenever you play a Power, gain [E].
sneckomod:SerpentineSleuth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION_BATTLE: Ethereal. NL Whenever you play a Power, gain [E] [E].
